meanings.definition: The projecting part of the body formed by the side of the pelvis and the upper part of the femur.
meanings.sent1: She injured her hip while dancing.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined her hip after the fall.
meanings.sent3: He tried to balance a book on his hip, but it kept slipping off.
meanings.sent4: The mountain peak looked like a hip jutting out of the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The hip bone connects the leg to the torso.

meanings.sent1: She wore a hip dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: The new store sells hip clothing for young adults.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at a hip hairstyle ended up looking funny.
meanings.sent4: The hip design of the building caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The hip accessories completed her outfit perfectly.

meanings.definition: Aware of or knowledgeable about the latest trends or developments.
meanings.sent1: She is always so hip with the latest music.
meanings.sent2: Being hip to technology trends is important in today's world.
meanings.sent3: He tried to act hip by using slang he didn't understand.
meanings.sent4: The hip crowd gathered at the new art exhibit.
meanings.sent5: Staying hip requires keeping up with current events.
